quote: The situation is very slightly solemn and thus embarrassing, as are all such situations when after the initial lovemaking, the lovers confront a future they are suddenly required to take on.
quote_letters: THE SITUATION IS VERY SLIGHTLY SOLEMN AND THUS EMBARRASSING AS ARE ALL SUCH SITUATIONS WHEN AFTER THE INITIAL LOVEMAKING THE LOVERS CONFRONT A FUTURE THEY ARE SUDDENLY REQUIRED TO TAKE ON
